decision_conditions: Insufficient details have been submitted to demonstrate that the entire development will achieve the highest standards of fire safety .The applicant has failed to demonstrate an unobstructed external space can be secured and utilised for fire appliances to to be positioned nor  demonstrate a direct and unobstructed direct thoroughfare at the rear of 111-115 Ewell Road commercial units to provide access to the application site in  an emergency situation.  As such the proposal has failed to demonstrate compliance with the requirements of Condition 5 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning application  23/02094/FUL ) and is contrary to  Policy D12 (Fire Safety) of the London Plan 2021.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 5 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 23/02094/FUL (Erection of first floor extension to create 2nos. self-contained apartments, with access, bin and cycle storage and associated alterations.)
